name: contact_info
description: Extract phone and email from conversation

output.name: phone_number
output.description: Caller's phone number in E.164 format (+1XXXXXXXXXX). Null if not provided.

output.name: phone_confirmed
output.description: True if agent read back the number AND caller confirmed it was correct

output.name: email
output.description: Caller's email address. Preserve exact spelling. Null if not provided.

output.name: email_confirmed
output.description: True if agent spelled it back AND caller confirmed it was correct

rules: Add +1 prefix if US number without country code

examples.input:
Agent: What's your phone number?
Caller: 404-555-1234
Agent: 404-555-1234?
Caller: Yes

Agent: What's your phone number?
Caller: My number is 678-999-8888

Agent: And can I get an email too?
Caller: It's devon.smith@statefarm.com
Agent: Got it, d-e-v-o-n dot s-m-i-t-h at state farm dot com?
Caller: That's correct

Agent: What's your phone number?
Caller: I'd rather not give that out
